LanguageData.RPThingMaker.label: Modular Fabricator
LanguageData.RPThingMaker.description:
An automated machine with 3d printing, laser etching and plasma cutting capabilities:


Valid Recipes:

Components: RimPoly and Electrosteel Wool.

Advanced Components: RimPoly, Electrosteel Wool and Gold Wool.
LanguageData.RPThingMakerInput.label: Modular Fabricator Input
LanguageData.RPThingMakerInput.description: Holds input resources for use by the modular fabricator during production.
LanguageData.RPThingMakerOutput.label: Modular Fabricator Output
LanguageData.RPThingMakerOutput.description: Holds output products from the modular fabricator.
